<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> argNeedsQuotes(StringRef Arg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-path-cpp-/stringref/#ad0f54a163ac500b144590640c6f1eb6b">StringRef::npos</a> != Arg.find&#95;first&#95;of(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\t \\&quot;&amp;\\&#39;()&#42;&lt;&gt;\\\\&#96;^|\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::string quoteSingleArg(StringRef Arg) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.push&#95;back(</Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;&quot;&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Arg.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstNonBackslash = Arg.find&#95;first&#95;not&#95;of(</Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\\\&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BackslashCount = FirstNonBackslash;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (FirstNonBackslash == <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-path-cpp-/stringref/#ad0f54a163ac500b144590640c6f1eb6b">StringRef::npos</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The entire remainder of the argument is backslashes.  Escape all of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// them and just early out.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">      BackslashCount = Arg.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.append(BackslashCount &#42; 2, </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\\\&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Arg&#91;FirstNonBackslash&#93; == </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\&quot;&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is an embedded quote.  Escape all preceding backslashes, then</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// add one additional backslash to escape the quote.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.append(BackslashCount &#42; 2 + 1, </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\\\&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.push&#95;back(</Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\&quot;&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is just a normal character.  Don&#39;t escape any of the preceding</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// backslashes, just append them as they are and then append the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// character.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.append(BackslashCount, </Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;\\\\&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.push&#95;back(Arg&#91;FirstNonBackslash&#93;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Drop all the backslashes, plus the following character.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">    Arg = Arg.drop&#95;front(FirstNonBackslash + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.push&#95;back(</Highlight><Highlight kind="charliteral">&#39;&quot;&#39;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/erroror">ErrorOr&lt;std::wstring&gt;</a> sys::flattenWindowsCommandLine(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;StringRef&gt;</a> Args) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string Command;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Arg : Args) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (argNeedsQuotes(Arg))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">      Command += quoteSingleArg(Arg);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/sdwa/#a487d59303b94fbf4adddd9a08c30da0aaddbc3f8d705f646af626fd73cdf3618b">DWORD</a> milliSecondsToWait = SecondsToWait ? &#42;SecondsToWait &#42; 1000 : INFINITE;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/sys/processinfo">ProcessInfo</a> WaitResult = PI;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">    ProcStat-&gt;reset();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!TerminateProcess(PI.Process, 1)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ErrMsg)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -2 indicates a crash or timeout as opposed to failure to execute.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
